# handleView()

**Instance Method**

Handles a view through ad impression.

## Declaration

```swift
func handleView() async throws
```

## Discussion

Call this method on the app impression to register a person’s viewing of the ad content.

## Displaying view-through ads

- **beginView()**: Begins recording a view-through impression when ad content corresponding to the impression becomes visible.
- **endView()**: Ends the view-through impression when the ad content corresponding to the impression disappears.
